00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include "libphonefirewall.h" 
00025 
00026 #define BLACKLIST_PREFIX "db/blacklist_"
00027 #define WHITELIST_PREFIX "db/whitelist_"
00028 
00029 static char* DELIM = "::";
00030 
00031 int add_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00032         FILE *file;
00033         char *prefix = "db/blacklist_";
00034         int filename_size = sizeof(country_code) + sizeof(area_code) + sizeof(prefix) + 10;
00035         char filename[filename_size];
00036 
00037         snprintf(filename, filename_size, "%s%d-%d", prefix, country_code, area_code);
00038 
00039         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00040         fprintf(file, "%d%s%lld%s%d%s%d%s%s%s%s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00041         fflush(file);
00042         fclose(file);
00043 
00044         return 0;
00045 }
00046 
00047 int add_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, long long int number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00048         FILE *file;
00049         char *prefix = "db/whitelist_";
00050         int filename_size = sizeof(country_code) + sizeof(area_code) + sizeof(prefix) + 10;
00051         char filename[filename_size];
00052 
00053         snprintf(filename, filename_size, "%s%d-%d", prefix, country_code, area_code);
00054 
00055         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00056         fprintf(file, "%d%s%lld%s%d%s%d%s%s%s%s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00057         fflush(file);
00058         fclose(file);
00059 
00060         return 0;
00061 }

00063 int rm_blacklist_entry (long long int number) {
00064         return -ENOSYS;
00065 }
00066 
00067 int rm_whitelist_entry (long long int number) {
00068         return -ENOSYS;
00069 }
00070 
00071 char *check_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, long long int number) {
00072         FILE *file;
00073         char *prefix = "db/blacklist_";
00074         int filename_size = sizeof(country_code) + sizeof(area_code) + sizeof(prefix) + 10;
00075         char filename[filename_size];
00076 
00077         snprintf(filename, filename_size, "%s%d-%d", prefix, country_code, area_code);
00078 
00079         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return NULL;
00080 
00081         char line[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00082         char *substr = NULL; 
00083         char strnumber[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00084         char *hit = NULL;
00085         snprintf(strnumber, sizeof(strnumber), "%lld", number);
00086 
00087         while ( !feof(file) ) {
00088                 if( 0 != fgets(line, sizeof(line), file) ) {
00089                         substr = strtok(line, DELIM);
00090                         substr = strtok(NULL, DELIM);
00091                         if ( 0 == strcmp(substr, strnumber)  ) {
00092                                 hit = substr;
00093                                 return hit;
00094                         }
00095                 } 
00096         }
00097         return hit;
00098 }
00099 
00100 char *check_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, long long int number) {
